title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/showmeyourgarden](/r/showmeyourgarden/) This is a community to share your plants, gardens, plant asks, etc. And this is also very safe space please join a community if you feel like you belong. Sorry about the poorly photo shopped photo but I had to leave my cat behind because I am going to college, and don't have many photos of her with a non toxic plant. So in order to kick of Non toxic plant with a pet Wednesday here is pumpkin holding a rabbit foot mantra.
